content: Testing debug-thinking MCP server for audit

GSI updates not applied: Thinking hooks not registered to Claude settings. Multiple features created but not integrated into npm package. User vision for claudeception requires full rework with GSI patterns.

The 4 workflow modules (patch-manager.ts, thinking-orchestrator.ts, workflow-chainer.ts, knowledge-base.ts) exist in source code at get-shit-indexed/lib/workflow-modules/ but were never added to the npm package. The package was not repacked after creating these modules. Version 1.23.0 doesn't include them.

Settings.json has NO hooks section registered. The thinking-invoke.js hook exists in hooks/pre-tool-use/ but is never called. All Phase 20 thinking integration work created the code but never connected it to Claude's hook system.
SOLUTION: 1) Add hooks section to settings.json pointing to GSI hooks, 2) Create /gsi:claudeception command with full GSI integration, 3) Repack npm package to include all new modules
